full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EC095-230003: Regional Master Standing Offer for Fresh Fruit and Vegetables

### Tender Reference Number

WS3919153351-Doc3972879099

### Tender Status

* English: Expired
* French: Expiré

### Request for Standing Offer

Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply, delivery, and offloading of fresh fruit and vegetables. This contract will be effective for a period of approximately 10 months, six of which are outlined in four events.

### Scope of Work

Bidders may choose to submit offers for one or multiple events. For each contract, bidders will be responsible for providing the following:

* Providing fresh fruit and vegetables of various quantities and types as and when required.
* Deloading and offloading containers at designated ports in Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick, and Nova Scotia.

### Eligibility and Qualifications

Only Canadian suppliers are eligible to bid for the tender. Suppliers must be able to provide proper documentation to demonstrate their qualifications and meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

### Tender Method

The selection process for this tender is based on the Lowest Price methodology. Bidders will be evaluated based on their competitive price offering.

### Contractual Obligations

Contractual obligations will be fulfilled for approximately 10 months. The first period of the contract will commence on May 1, 2023, and the last period will conclude on March 31, 2024.

### Contact Information

For further information or clarification on the tender, please contact:

* Andrew MacFarlane (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: 

* There is no notice URL attached to this post.
* All relevant documentation can be found at the link provided.
* Suppliers must carefully review the terms and conditions attached to this posting. 

Public Works and Government Services Canada will provide due diligence towards any formal complaints.

# Project Categories

* Procurement Category: Government Departmental Services
* Economic Classification Code (ECC): 50300000 (Fresh fruits)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Please provide an acknowledgement of the tender. Suppliers have given the option of registering their interest by letter, email, or phone, but they are not required to do so.

Best regards
